name: Frank J. MAZUREK, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner
docket_number: Petition No. 642 Western District Allocatur Docket 1998

parties: Frank J. MAZUREK, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 1st day of November, 2000, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, the order of the Commonwealth Court is reversed and the case is remanded for proceedings consistent with Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Transportation v. McCafferty, 563 Pa. 146, 758 A.2d 1155 (2000).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
760 A.2d 848
Frank J. MAZUREK, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 1, 2000.
